title: Dog Monster v1.0
description:
Size: 49.6 MB
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish
Requirements: Compatible with iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPod touch (3rd generation), iPod touch (4th generation), iPod touch (5th generation) and iPad. Requires iOS 4.3 or later. This app is optimized for iPhone 5.



Run, jump, smash and unleash the monster!

Dogs love chasing cars and this time its full of yummy food. Avoid flying fruits, collect coins and turn your cute pet into a hungry DOG MONSTER. This is where the real rampage begins, smashing everything in it's path, Dog Monster wants that truck so that he can smash it up as well!

Dog Monster is a hilarious kid friendly game that is simple, yet addictive and features lots of funny and lovable characters.

PLAY MULTIPLAYER! Enjoy Dog Monster with your friends online Ã¢â‚¬â€ you can play competitive multiplayer via Game Center, or have your friends over and play via Bluetooth!

Available for iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S, 5, iPod Touch, iPad and iPad Mini.
